name: ArtExpressions
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: art expressions
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Artistic Slideshows designed for all Echo Show devices. New updated and curated AI illustrations added regularly. Slideshows last up to 12 hours. Slideshow Categories include:

- Cyberpunk Cities
- Tropical Scenes
- Impressionist Art
- Modern Art
- Galaxy Scenes
- Blackout Mode*

*Blackout Mode shows a black screen.

To start, say "[Alexa], Open Art Expressions" and then use your Echo Show to select the slideshow you'd like to play from the menu. Once the slideshow begins playing, you can tap anywhere on the screen to return to the menu. Images transition after one minute. The slideshow will loop continuously for 12 hours or until stopped.

Since Art Expressions is a visual slideshow skill, it will not work on any Echo device besides Echo Show. It is not formatted for Fire TVs. This skill works on Echo Show devices only.


Suggest new categories for slideshows! Send suggestions to suggestions@crunchysoda.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
